text: Ahmad Zahir (born 25 March 2001) is an Afghan cricketer. He made his first- class debut for Boost Region in the 2018 Ahmad Shah Abdali 4-day Tournament on 13 March 2018. He made his List A debut for Kandahar Province in the 2019 Afghanistan Provincial Challenge Cup tournament on 1 August 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Afghan cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ahmad Zahir (cricketer)
